name: multi-tab-summarizer
description: Chrome extension that generates AI-powered summaries of all open tabs using OpenAI or local Ollama models

scripts.build: echo 'No build process required for this extension'
scripts.lint: echo 'Consider adding ESLint for code quality'
scripts.dev: echo 'Load unpacked extension in Chrome for development'
scripts.icons: echo 'Convert SVG to PNG: convert icons/icon.svg -resize 16x16 icons/icon16.png && convert icons/icon.svg -resize 48x48 icons/icon48.png && convert icons/icon.svg -resize 128x128 icons/icon128.png'

author: Your Name
